scripts.dev:copy-assets: node build-scripts/copy-assets builds/dev && node build-scripts/copy-assets-dev builds/dev
scripts.dist:main-sass: node-sass --include-path src/scss src/main.scss builds/dist/main.css && cleancss -o builds/dist/main.css builds/dist/main.css
scripts.dev: yarn run dev:webpack && yarn run dev:main-sass && yarn run dev:copy-assets
scripts.dist: yarn run dist:webpack && yarn run dist:main-sass && yarn run dist:copy-assets
